item.description:
The band is Four on the Floor again and you just have to get up and boogie when they are playing...The dance floor is small and crowded and it also gets hot so dress light...BUT you will have fun. Dana will be hosting this event and will arrive around 8:00 P.M. If you get there earlier please save tables and chairs. The band will start at 9. Have a great time...I will miss you all!!!
Sandy

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dancing at Palmers
